product_context.title: BESTTEN 10 Pack Single Pole Decorator Wall Light Switch with Screwless Wallplate, 15A 120/277V, On/Off Paddle Rocker Interrupter, UL Listed, White

reviews.productTitle: BESTTEN 10 Pack Single Pole Decorator Wall Light Switch with Screwless Wallplate, 15A 120/277V, On/Off Paddle Rocker Interrupter, UL Listed, White
reviews.text: Wall plates are extremely difficult to snap in place. So far I have installed 8 different switches and only one wall plate will attach. You have to mess around with adding washers and adjusting the electrical box to make the plate attach. Not worth spending an extra 15- 20 extra on each outlet/switch. Don’t waste your money and just get the screw on plates. I am now having to order a bunch of screw in wall plates now which is frustrating.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 20, 2025
reviews.title: Don’t waste your money

reviews.productTitle: BESTTEN 10 Pack Single Pole Decorator Wall Light Switch with Screwless Wallplate, 15A 120/277V, On/Off Paddle Rocker Interrupter, UL Listed, White
reviews.text: These covers look clean and modern. Easy to install and great quality plastic. Gave my home a refreshed look. Would buy again.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 19, 2025
reviews.title: Great value and sleek look

reviews.productTitle: BESTTEN 10 Pack Single Pole Decorator Wall Light Switch with Screwless Wallplate, 15A 120/277V, On/Off Paddle Rocker Interrupter, UL Listed, White
reviews.text: I put these switches in my entire home 3 years ago, I have had to replace a couple already because they were completely broken, 90 percent of every switch I have is cracked shown in the picture. These probably aren't good for anyone that doesn't know how to swap out the switches every couple years. Wouldn't recommend.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2024
reviews.title: Only last a couple years

reviews.productTitle: BESTTEN 10 Pack Single Pole Decorator Wall Light Switch with Screwless Wallplate, 15A 120/277V, On/Off Paddle Rocker Interrupter, UL Listed, White
reviews.text: Just recently moved into a newer house. All the switches and recepticals were that creamy almond color. Spruced things up a bit by instaling these BESTTEN wall outlets as well as the paddle switches for the lights. NUMBE ONE-> BE SURE TO TURN OFF YOUR BREAKER TO THE SWITCH/OUTLET YOU WILL BE WORKING ON! Safety is not second here. Most of the wiring in the house was 14 AWG so the wires just slid into the back! Others were the 12 AWG and needed to be screwed to the side mount screws. Also since the attaching screws are under the faceplate, the look is so clean. Makes the house look super modern now!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2024
reviews.title: Easy to Install

reviews.text: They’re not perfect. We’ve had two switches that stopped working on us. Our most used light switch in the house is really hard to turn off after 6 months of use. But it’s still functional! And for the price, we’re happy. We’ll be purchasing them for the rest of the house.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 19, 2023
reviews.title: Good for the price!

reviews.productTitle: BESTTEN 10 Pack Single Pole Decorator Wall Light Switch with Screwless Wallplate, 15A 120/277V, On/Off Paddle Rocker Interrupter, UL Listed, White
reviews.text: These are great. Value for money. Beautiful to look at. A little finicky to install but the real downfall of these (and not just this manufacture ) is that THE SCREWS THEY SUPPLY ARE ALWAYS 1/4" TOO SHORT. HELLO!! Is anyone from QC reading the comments? I'm seeing a lot of people complaining about the length of the screws. They are just too short for North American homes. We don't live in paper houses lol so need longer screws. If they changed the screws to 1" it would be perfect.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2023
reviews.title: Beautiful switches

reviews.productTitle: BESTTEN 10 Pack Single Pole Decorator Wall Light Switch with Screwless Wallplate, 15A 120/277V, On/Off Paddle Rocker Interrupter, UL Listed, White
reviews.text: These LOOK great, but they SOUND cheap. They are LOUD. Theres no way I could live with the loud clicking sound every time you turned them on and off. Only $50 more for the entire house to install the better brand from home depot... you get what you pay for.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2022
reviews.title: very loud

reviews.productTitle: BESTTEN 10 Pack Single Pole Decorator Wall Light Switch with Screwless Wallplate, 15A 120/277V, On/Off Paddle Rocker Interrupter, UL Listed, White
reviews.text: The wall plate is think and extends beyond the switch - see photo. They attempted to hide screws, but as a result it made the plate to thick. Additionally there were some quality issues with the switch wire push-in not holding and slipping right back out. Had to use screw downs to make sure good contact was made and wires were not loose.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2021
reviews.title: Wall Plate Thick and Odd Fit

reviews.productTitle: BESTTEN 10 Pack Single Pole Decorator Wall Light Switch with Screwless Wallplate, 15A 120/277V, On/Off Paddle Rocker Interrupter, UL Listed, White
reviews.text: The other BESTTEN products tricked me into thinking these were the seamless design - they’re not. I should have noticed there were no side pictures. Still better looking than a plate with screws though. They’re also the loudest light switch you’ll ever hear. For the price they’re not worth returning - just won’t be putting them in a bedroom.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2021
reviews.title: Sandwich style and loud

reviews.productTitle: BESTTEN 10 Pack Single Pole Decorator Wall Light Switch with Screwless Wallplate, 15A 120/277V, On/Off Paddle Rocker Interrupter, UL Listed, White
reviews.text: So I ordered these switches, because all the big brands carried at HomeDepot & co now have their branding on the switches. I'm pretty happy so far, except for the wall plates. The are a "sandwich" design, which don't match for example the BESTTEN USWP4 2gang face plates, or other smart switches like Kasa and c by ge. Now I have to order the face plates that are the correct design...
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2020
reviews.title: Screwless plate not the expected design

reviews.text: These are easy to install but I will be returning them. Though they have a color description of white, they do not match the “white” of any of the other product lines and now their three-way white switches are unavailable. When placed next two the other switches, the difference in white is significant so I will need to piece-meal another brand to see how I can get all of these to match.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 4, 2020
reviews.title: White Does Not Match Other Bestten White

reviews.productTitle: BESTTEN 10 Pack Single Pole Decorator Wall Light Switch with Screwless Wallplate, 15A 120/277V, On/Off Paddle Rocker Interrupter, UL Listed, White
reviews.text: For the most part these are a breeze to install, but I had a few that had issues with the push in quick wire slots not tightening down, which meant switching to side wiring screws that I struggled with a lot more than I needed too because my house wire is so thick. The experience has put me off buying their receptacles with usb for fear that their quickwiring may be faulty.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2019
reviews.title: A little more frustrating than they needed to be

reviews.text: The way you connect the wires, it is hard to install. It is hard to adjust. We installed only two to find that both do not click well, one of them doesn't click in one direction at all and has to be pushed down really hard, beyond the normal end-position, to turn off. Returned based on poor quality.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2018
reviews.title: Hard to install and don't work well.
